name: Invader Game 1
description:
This is my first game on this website.

Move your mouse to aim.

Press space or click to fire.

Press b to launch a wall.

Don't let the enemies invade the base.

There are 5 enemies in this game.

Normal enemy (red) Most common to spawn.

Fast enemy (pink) Moves fast.

Multiply enemy (dark red) Spawns 3 enemies when hit.

Leader enemy (yellow) Spawns 5-10 enemies when spawned

Shield enemy (blue) spawns shield when spawned [when the shield gets hit, it shrinks your bullet.]

I hope you enjoy it. And please, if there are any bugs, report them to me.
